Content: The world’s oldest film is Roundhay Garden Scene (1888).
Adolphe Le Prince, Joseph Whitley, Sarah Whitley, and Annie Hartley are walking leisurely in the garden.
Sarah Whitley is walking or dancing backward while turning around.
Joseph Whitley is turning, with his coattails flying.
All figures are wearing historic late-19th century attire.
The garden walls of Oakwood Grange form the background setting, and the gardens are lush with trees and vegetation.
Le Prince is using his single-lens camera to film Roundhay Garden Scene.
The single-lens cine camera by Louis Le Prince measures 576 mm x 275 mm x 430 mm and is made of wood, metal, glass, and brass (a copper-zinc alloy).
The Roundhay Garden Scene
Single-lens Cine Camera by Louis Le Prince
LPCCP Type-1 MkII <image_1>
The small Regency-era parlor creates a tense atmosphere.
Mr. Darcy stands tall and handsome with a proud and slightly arrogant posture.
Mr. Darcy wears a dark, tailored Regency tailcoat with a waistcoat and a crisp white cravat.
Mr. Darcy shows a serious, intense, and conflicted expression.
Elizabeth Bennet stands opposite him with bright, intelligent eyes and lively features.
Elizabeth Bennet wears a light-colored empire waist gown with short sleeves and delicate flowing fabric.
Elizabeth Bennet has her hair neatly pinned up in a simple Regency style.
Elizabeth Bennet shows cheeks that are slightly flushed with anger and embarrassment.
Elizabeth Bennet faces Mr. Darcy firmly with an expression of refusal and defiance.
The atmosphere conveys dramatic emotional tension and confrontation, not romantic softness.

Content: The image shows the interior of a late 18th-century shop.
The shop is decorated in an elegant style.
The shop contains four sections with different goods.
One section displays furs and fans.
One section displays fabrics for dresses.
One section displays haberdashery, jewelry, and clocks.
One section displays perfume and hats.
Several people are browsing inside the shop.
The shop interior is separated from the street outside.
Kiva Han was the first coffee shop in Constantinople (Istanbul), during the late 15th to early 16th century.
Locals and travelers gathered inside and engaged in lively conversation.
The coffee shop created a cultural hub atmosphere, with artists, scholars, and merchants exchanging ideas and discussing politics.
A bustling Ottoman street scene was visible outside the shop.
Traditional Turkish coffee was prepared with finely ground beans, boiled in a cezve (Turkish coffee pot) with sugar.
Small cups of Turkish coffee were served, with grounds settling at the bottom.
Lü Bu is standing before gathered generals, halting a potential battle with his archery skill.
A sharpened ji (polearm/halberd) is erected several hundred feet away, with its blade pointed upward.
Lü Bu is drawing his bow with his sleeves rolled back, and the bow is bent like a crescent moon.
An arrow is flying like a falling star, striking the slender blade of the ji.
Generals Liu Bei and Ji Ling are watching in disbelief.
The crowd is erupting in acclamation, praising Lü Bu’s Heaven-like might.
Lü Bu has a lofty and dignified appearance, with a majestic and awe-inspiring bearing.
His hair is pulled back and worn in a golden headdress.
He is wearing a flowery-patterned battle robe beneath his armor.
His body armor is decorated with images of the ni (a mythical creature).
He is wearing a precious belt adorned with a lion motif.
Lü Bu
Fang Tian Ji
The assembly hall is located on the ground floor, with a spectacular ceiling formed by the structural reach above.
The main building is shaped like a palaver tree, with a trunk, crown, and façade design.
The hollow trunk forms a central courtyard, which is naturally ventilated with indirect light.
A spiral staircase stands at the center, connecting the assembly hall to the upper offices.
The roof terrace on the top floor provides sweeping views of the city and lagoon.
A public park with native Benin flora surrounds the building.
A generous shaded gathering space lies under the “palaver tree,” open for citizens’ deliberation.
Benin National Assembly

It has a red, spherical head with a ring shape and multiple eyeballs.
It has a smiling mouth in the center of its head.

The Tiangong Super Robot's final adjusted time was 21.50 seconds.
Lingyi Technology's Yushu H1 robot took second place.
The Yushu H1 robot's final adjusted time in second place was 22.08 seconds.
Gaoe Technology's Yushu H1 robot took third place.
The Yushu H1 robot's final adjusted time in third place was 24.53 seconds.

The 2024 World Food Prize laureates are Cary Fowler and Geoffrey Hawtin.
The Svalbard Global Seed Vault is located on the remote Arctic island of Spitsbergen in Norway.
The Svalbard Global Seed Vault stores more than 20 million seed samples from around the world.
The Svalbard Global Seed Vault serves as a safeguard for the world’s food supply.
The vault provides protection against risks such as mismanagement, accidents, equipment failures, and funding cuts.
The vault provides security against external threats such as war, sabotage, and disease.
The vault enhances resilience against natural disasters through long-term frozen seed storage.
Geoffrey Charles Hawtin
Cary Fowler Jr.
Svalbard Global Seed Vault
The 2025 Pritzker Architecture Prize laureate is Liu Jiakun.
The award ceremony takes place at the Louvre Abu Dhabi.
The Louvre Abu Dhabi has a large shallow dome with a perforated lattice pattern.
The building shows low white cubic volumes beneath the dome.
Turquoise water surrounds the white building blocks.
Sunlight casts dappled light through the dome’s lattice onto nearby surfaces.
Liu Jaikun
The Louvre Abu Dhabi
The laureate is Riken Yamamoto.
The award ceremony took place at the Art Institute of Chicago.
The Art Institute of Chicago has a neoclassical façade.
The building is made of light-colored stone.
The central section of the façade has a triangular pediment on top.
The pediment is supported by three large arched windows.
The windows are framed by decorative columns.
Two bronze lion statues stand in front of the entrance.
A wide staircase leads up to the main entrance.
Several flagpoles with flags extend from the front of the building.
The façade has decorative inscriptions of artist names carved into the stone.
Rectangular windows line both sides of the central entrance section.
Riken Yamamoto
Art Institute of Chicago

The Alef Model A is an electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft.

Content: The Alef Model A is designed to carry one passenger and one pilot.

The Soyuz MS-24 spacecraft landed on Earth on April 6, 2024.
NASA astronaut Loral O’Hara returned from Expedition 70.
Roscosmos cosmonaut Oleg Novitsky was part of the landing crew.
Belarusian spaceflight participant Marina Vasilevskaya was part of ISS EP-21.
The crew wore white Sokol spacesuits after landing.
The female astronaut’s suit had blue trim.
All three astronauts wore black space masks.
A Russian flag patch was visible on the female astronaut’s arm.
A male astronaut wore a white suit with an American flag patch on the arm.
Loral Ashley O'Hara
Oleg Viktorovich Novitsky
Maryna Vitaleuna Vasileuskaya
Soyuz MS-24 approaching the ISS

Huawei's first office was located in a modest apartment in Shenzhen, China.
Each employee had a blanket and a mattress.
Many worked late into the night.
The apartment was crammed with desks, allowing employees to collaborate closely.
The founders interacted closely with their employees.
There is Huawei's early sunflower logo on the wall
